an4.31:1.1: “Cattarimani, bhikkhave, cakkani, yehi samannagatanam devamanussanam catucakkam vattati, yehi samannagata devamanussa nacirasseva mahantattam vepullattam papunanti bhogesu.
an4.31:1.3: Patirupadesavaso, sappurisavassayo, attasammapanidhi, pubbe ca katapunnata—
an4.31:1.4: Imani kho, bhikkhave, cattari cakkani, yehi samannagatanam devamanussanam catucakkam vattati, yehi samannagata devamanussa nacirasseva mahantattam vepullattam papunanti bhogesuti.
